description: Front Garden (Left Boundary) T1: Silver birch tree - Reduce height by 1.5m, reduce sides by 1m to balance, remove major deadwood height 6m & spread 4m. Reduce height to 4.5m & spread to 3.5mT2: Red robinia tree - Reduce height by 1m, trim to shape height 2m & spread 2m. Reduce height to 2.5m & spread to 2m(Right Boundary) Back Garden (Left Boundary) T4: Leylandii tree - Reduce height by 2m, height 7m & spread 4m. Reduce height to 5m & spread to 3.5mT5: Cherry tree - Reduce height by 1.5m, remove major deadwood height 4m & spread 3m. Reduce height to 2.5m & spread to 3mT6: Red robinia tree - Fell to ground level, dig or grind out stump height 12m & spread 6m. Reduce height to 10m & spread to 5mBack Garden (Left Boundary) T8: Grandiflora tree - Reduce height by 2m through selective thinningheight 4m & spread 4m. Reduce height to 3m & spread to 3mT10: Spotted laurel tree - Reduce height by 0.5m,  height 2m & spread 1m. Reduce height to 1.8m & spread to 1m(Right Boundary) T11: Camellia shrub - Prune to shape by 0.5mheight 2m & spread 2m. Reduce height to 1.5m & spread to 2mT3: Magnolia tree - Reduce height by 1.5m, reduce sides by 1m, remove major deadwood height 4m & spread 3m. Reduce height to 2.5m & spread to 2mReason for work General tree maintenance More light clearance from buildinglift over road low treesmaintaining this tree in its current settingsuppressing growth of shrubsoverhanging foot path
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
